ygData.subject: Re: I am curious - Instill Doubt
ygData.msgSnippet: What is instill doubt anyway?  I haven t got it yet (soon I think?) but have seen no descriptions of it anywhere. Elwyn Level 21 Bard Erollosi Marr ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
What is instill doubt anyway? I haven't got it yet (soon I think?) but have
seen no descriptions of it anywhere.

Elwyn
Level 21 Bard
Erollosi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 24, 1999 2:41 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] I am curious - Instill Doubt


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

me too. i have hit the button a million times and it has never gone up. my
level 40+ bard friend says he got his to master just by using it, but i have
been unsuccessful. it basically just sits there as a macro i never use, but
wish i could.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 46 Bard, Mithaniel Marr

> Subject: [eqbards] I am curious - Instill Doubt
>
>
> From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
>
>
> Has anyone on this list:
>
> a) Ever seen Instill Doubt increase in skill?
> b) Ever intimidated anyone or anything?
>
> I have been using this skill ever since I got it, and I've

> than pose and prance with it.
>
> Jyzan
